price: San (maa no) nti mmͻborͻ akoma a efri Yεn hͻ, san yԑԑ no (nipa) kronkron; na ͻyε obi a osuro Nyame.
arabic: وَحَنَانٗا مِّن لَّدُنَّا وَزَكَوٰةٗۖ وَكَانَ تَقِيّٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: waḥanānan min ladunnā wazakatan wakāna taqiyyan
